welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bang Phlat, Thailand! Known for its vibrant culture and beautiful river views, we are excited to have you here. We invite you to immerse yourselves in our city's charm and enjoy all that it has to offer. Happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Don Muang Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used mainly for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Users must register with their email address to access the network.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Suvarnabhumi Airport, serving a wide range of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights and regional destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly built terminal dedicated to low-cost carriers and budget airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi for up to 2 hours per day.
